name: planetearth
0:
”Alexa open planet earth”
”tell me earth facts”
”earth facts”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: planet earth
des:
This skill purpose is to tell facts about earth when user asks to.
To invoke this skill user have to say "open planet earth"
After invocation call Alexa welcomes the user and tells user to ask facts about earth.
when user says "tell me earth facts" , Alexa responds by telling an interesting about earth fact.
To stop the skill user can say bye or stop.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
